column1: #Text=Bolin says : " You looked like you were just sitting on a pillow . "
#Text=Varrick says : " Are you saying I was n't levitating ? "
#Text=Varrick says : " Well , why did n't anyone tell me ?
#Text=As you know , Future Industries is looking for a partner to handle our shipping .
#Text=But first you got ta check out my new venture !
#Text=Ginger , come over here and do your poses .
#Text=And , we tell a story ; there 's romance , action , some funny animal stuff for the kids .
#Text=We 're gon na do big business with these movers as I call them .
#Text=" Asami says : " Okay ... but I 'm just concentrating on getting Future Industries back on track .
#Text=If we could hammer out a deal ... " Varrick says : " Stop !
#Text=" Varrick says : " We got a deal !
#Text=We 'll hammer out the details at the royal feast tonight .
#Text=Now , who wants a rocket boat ride ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Is that how business usually goes ?
#Text=" Asami says : " You are a natural assistant !
